content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_helmet
inventory=[{"type": "snow", "quantity": 37, "index": 12}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 24, "index": 14}, {"type": "birch_leaves", "quantity": 41, "index": 19}, {"type": "arrow", "quantity": 56, "index": 23}, {"type": "jungle_leaves", "quantity": 62, "index": 30}, {"type": "tipped_arrow", "quantity": 55, "index": 31}, {"type": "spider_eye", "quantity": 32, "index": 32}, {"type": "bee_nest", "quantity": 44, "index": 37}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 5, "index": 40}]
thought: To craft an iron helmet, I need to place 3 iron ingots on top of each other in the crafting grid. First I will move one iron ingot from slot 40 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 40 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_helmet

Ok
act: move from slot 40 to slot 2 with quantity 1
